hero.title: What the process to implement DocumentoIQ looks like
hero.subtitle: DocumentoIQ follows a structured process to ensure each implementation generates real value from the start, respecting confidentiality, existing flows, and human control at every stage.
hero.microcopy: Designed for sectors where precision and traceability are critical.

why.title: A process designed to minimize risks and maximize results
why.text: We work with critical documents and sensitive processes. Therefore, DocumentoIQ is not implemented as a generic tool, but as a solution that adapts to your real flows, validates results, and scales in a controlled manner.

step1.title: 1. Discovery Call
step1.description: We understand your current processes, document types, volumes, and business objectives. This session allows us to evaluate if DocumentoIQ is the right solution for your case and define the initial scope.

step2.title: 2. NDA / MOU
step2.description: We sign confidentiality and understanding agreements to protect your information, documents, and internal processes.
step2.footer: DocumentoIQ is designed to operate in regulated and sensitive environments.

step3.title: 3. Pilot Test
step3.description: We implement a no-cost* pilot test with real documents and controlled workflows. Here we validate precision, times, and operational value for the organizational entity.
step3.footer: ‚è± Results visible in days, not months.
step3.disclaimer: *The no-cost pilot is subject to restrictions indicated in NDA.

step4.title: 4. Production Setup
step4.description: Once you make sure DocumentoIQ is the tool you need, we configure the production operation: business rules, workflows, and integrations (API / internal systems). Throughout the adoption process, we will accompany you with our Customer Support Agents and a dedicated Account Manager.

step5.title: 5. Scale Workflows
step5.description: We scale DocumentoIQ to more document types, more areas or teams, and higher volumes. All in a progressive and controlled manner. In addition, we will continue to accompany you on the journey and provide support when you need it.

expectations.title: What our clients get by following this process
items: Confidence at every stage of the process

assistive.title: Assistive AI, human control at all times
assistive.text1: DocumentoIQ assists document analysis, but final decisions always remain in the hands of your teams.
assistive.text2: Our process is designed to validate, adjust, and scale without compromising control or compliance.

cta.title: Ready to explore DocumentoIQ in your operation?
cta.subtitle: Request a demo and see how our process can adapt to your documents, flows, and business objectives.
cta.microcopy: The first step for a secure and measurable implementation.
